mapper.sql: id, username, OpenID, token, role, city, province, country, sex, tel, email, headimage, state, createTime, login, ip
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from t_user
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_user (username, OpenID, token, role, city, province, country, sex, tel, email, headimage, state, createTime, login, ip ) values (#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{token,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{role,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{headimage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{login,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},

OpenID = #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_user WHERE id = #{temp,jdbcType=BIGINT} and isstart = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}
SELECT * FROM t_user WHERE concat(username,',',OpenID,',',city,',',province,',',country,',',sex,',',email,',',tel) LIKE #{temp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and role = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}
mapper.update: update t_user set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OpenID = #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, token = #{token,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, role = #{role,jdbcType=TINYINT}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, headimage = #{headimage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, login = #{login,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
